DOC.brief_summary: To calculate sensitivity ( SN ) , specificity ( SP ) , positive predictive value ( PPV ) negative predictive value ( NPV ) PartoSure TTD test predict delivery within 7 14 day test compare cervical length ( CL ) measurement transvaginal ultrasound ( 15 mm cut-off )
DOC.brief_title: PartoSure Predict Spontaneous Preterm Delivery Pregnancies After Assisted Reproductive Technology ( ART )
DOC.detailed_description: - This trial prospective observational study . - Pregnancies ART 20 0/7 36 6/7 week symptoms preterm labor , clinically intact membrane , cervical dilatation ≤ 2 cm invite participate study . Signed consent form require able participate study . - PartoSure CL perform patient test-to-spontaneous-delivery interval calculate . - Trial Population : Pregnancies ART 20 0/7 36 6/7 week symptoms preterm labor hospitalize My Duc hospital October 2015 April 2016 . The sample size trial 100 subject .
DOC.criteria: To eligible enrollment trial , female subject must fulfill follow criterion start enrollment : Pregnancies assist reproductive technology include singleton twin Between 20 0/7 36 6/7 week symptoms preterm labor include uterine contraction , intermittent lower abdominal pain pelvic pressure . Clinically intact membrane . Cervical dilatation ≤ 2 cm Agree participate study , disclose medical event investigator Have give write informed consent To eligible enrollment study subject must meet following criterion : Vaginal bleeding Overt rupture fetal membrane indicate visualized leakage fluid cervix Placenta previa Cervical cerclage place Received tocolytic medication treatment threaten preterm delivery prior collection cervicovaginal specimen CL measurement . Digital exam prior specimen collection . A symptom associate idiopathic threaten preterm delivery ( e.g trauma ) Enrollment tocolytic study .
